alert.note: Alert for Henry; Oldham; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:31AM EDT until July 17 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Oldham County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Henry County in central Kentucky... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 230 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Castle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, La Grange, New Castle, Pendleton, Crestwood, Eminence, Pewee Valley, Smithfield, Chestnut Grove and Joyes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
